query: atrial fibrillation guidelines ESC AHA CCS amiodarone beta-blockers recommendations clinical practice first-line therapy
title: Temporal Trends in Atrial Fibrillation Ablation in the Elderly: Incidence of MACE and Recurrence Rates
authors: Alessandra Fusco, Morten Lock Hansen, Martin H. Ruwald, Christopher R. Zörner, Lise Riis-Vestergaard, Charlotte Middelfart, Regitze Hein, Peter Vibe Rasmussen, Antonio Di Sabatino, Gunnar Gislason, Jacob Tønnesen
reference: Fusco, A., Hansen, M. L., Ruwald, M. H., Zörner, C. R., Riis-Vestergaard, L., Middelfart, C., Hein, R., Rasmussen, P. V., Di Sabatino, A., Gislason, G., & Tønnesen, J. (2025). Temporal trends in atrial fibrillation ablation in the elderly: Incidence of MACE and recurrence rates. JACC: Clinical Electrophysiology, 11(1), 83-94. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jacep.2024.11.005
